description: Installation of a radio base station comprising of three panel antennas, two dish antennas, one radio equipment cabinet and development ancillary.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The telecommunications equipment hereby approved shall be finished in the following ways:

i)  The 2 panel antennas and fixings to be fixed to the main face of the building shall have an external finish to replicate the brickwork surface against which they are attached.

ii)  The antenna fixed to the existing roof top plant room shall have an external finish to replicate the plant room against which it is attached.

iii)  The 2 microwave dish antennas shall have an external finish to replicate the plant room against  and chimney against which they are attached.

iv)  The equipment cabinet shall have an external finish to replicate the adjacent plant room against which it faces.

The external finishes shall be applied prior to the first operation of the hereby approved equipment and maintained as such thereafter.

REASON: To ensure that the Authority may be satisfied with the external appearance of the building in accordance with policies D1, D4, D11 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan (2002) and the Conservation Area Design Guidelines (2002).
